body.p:
This release contains only a few new features and significant changes:
A new element called surplus has been added to the Transcription module, originally proposed by SF ticket 2242434
Content models of char and glyph were changed to require figure rather than any model./graphicLike< element (2812295)
An attribute role is now provided by the att.naming class making it possible to distinguish the functions of the people assopciated with particular name in a source without the trouble of defining person elements for them (1954920)
Following changes made to permit better documentation of constraints within an ODD, the element valList was changed from being a possible child of content to being a sibling of it.

Various minor clarifications and corrections were made to the wording of the Guidelines in response to Sourceforge tickets (e.g. 2881723, 2883950, 2813423 2877747, 2761884, 2863337, 2750513, 2820540, 2820541)
The work of the AFNOR group providing and correcting French translations and examples continued, with a large number of changes made in July, September, and November.

Other minor changes are listed below in reverse date order:
2009-11-08: Element classes model.headerPart and model.encodingPart were renamed as model.teiHeaderPart and model.encodingDescPart respectively, for consistency. (2874789)
2009-11-08: Element change was added to the att.datable class, and its locally defined when attribute removed ()
2009-11-06: Element relatedItem was given an target attribute per ?
2009-11-06: Expanded discussion of footnotes in CO to include use of ref to show point of attachment (2796148)
2009-11-06: Change content model of editorialDecl to permit intertwingling of paragraphs with more specialised elements, for consistency with other *Decl elements (2878062)
2009-11-02: Introduce new att.responsibility class and factor out inconsistent declarations of resp attributes (2818046)
2009-11-02: Allow initial general remarks element within decoDesc and layoutDesc (2866412)
2009-10-26: Resolve content model validation issues caused by definition of macro.anyXML
2009-10-01: Allow surface and zone to inherit start attribute from att.coordinated (2861324)
2009-10-01: Allow multiple catDesc children in definition of a single category (2843046)
2009-10-01: Move salute element to model.divWrapper class so that it can appear at either end of a div (2793874)
2009-08-01: Make origin optional on timeline (2820149)
